== Pampady (627724) ==

Pampady is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 598 hectares and harbouring 880 households with total population of 3515 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Ottappalam]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 1652 and female population is 1863. Scheduled Caste Population is 1154 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 627724<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate female population: 1479 (79.39%)
